de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes

Class BlockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.Component
        • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.BlockManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class BlockManager
extends Component

    A Component to handle the retrieval of OMM blocks and block information via the REST interface.

    Author:
    Christian Hauck
